about_the_game:
You are "Shadow", a lost soul who has the mission to rescue other souls after the great apocalypse.
Avoid the dangers, find the keys to leave the area, take the chests and coins, get the cursed soul in case you have to get rid of some big monster.
Multiple enemies, procedure rooms, chaotic gameplay, avoid traps and use runes.
Get souls, increase XP with all actions, help yourself with temporary events and enjoy the game.
Great infinite arcade for daily combat, future disaster needs you.

Only 1 game mode available in the demo.
- Fightower:
Enter the Cursed Tower, use the runes to get rid of the monsters and wait for any kind of surprise. Climb the plants and complete the stages. No one knows how many floors this eternal damnation has.

Check the game and enjoy!
